name: Joey + Rory
description: ''' Joey + Rory ''' was an American [[country music|country]] and [[bluegrass music|bluegrass]] duo from [[Columbia, Tennessee]]. The duo was composed of singer-songwriters [[Rory Feek]] (born April 25, 1965) and [[Joey Feek]] (September 9, 1975 â€“ March 4, 2016), who were husband and wife. Both members of the duo were vocalists and songwriters, with Rory also playing [[acoustic guitar]]. Prior to the duo's foundation, Rory wrote singles for other artists. The duo recorded for [[Vanguard Records]] and [[Bill Gaither|Gaither Music Group]] and charted three singles on [[Hot Country Songs]].
